Draft Letterdraft for your review and comments

ENA Cost Estimatesof preparing Level B estimates is in far right column on attached Forwarded by Jack BoatmanFGTEnron on PM Dennis Alters PM To Jack NRON cc Terry GalassiniET NRON Subject ENA Cost Estimates Please see the attached scoping cost estimates

Capacity Lease Backhaul GulfstreamWe are currently discussing several potential approaches for a Phase VII expansion project We have preliminary work underway on several potential scenarios some of which might involve Gulfstream as an upstream transporter As part of these discussions Gulfstream has inquired about FGTs interest in providing a capacity lease for backhaul service approximately miles they did not identify the specific market My questions are Backhaul capacity lease with an interstate pipeline Do you see any problemsissues The lease arrangement would be with Guflstream Pipeline If this backhaul lease capacity is used by Gulfstream to provide deliveries to an electric generator would the FPL Favored Nations Clause be triggered

Gulfstream Interconnects Meeting Tuesday at in EBCPlease plan to attend a meeting on Tuesday at in C to initiate discussions on potential businesssystem implications associated with the new Gulfstream interconnects in Florida These will be new receipt points in the FL Market Area and will go inservice by MayJune

RE Gulfstream Interconnects Meeting Wednesday at in EBC DATE CHANGEDate Change due to scheduling conflicts for several people this meeting is now planned for Wednesday at in C Let me know if this time does not work for you Original Message From Boatman Jack Sent Thursday January PM To Nacey Sheila Studebaker James Bastida Nancy Lokey Teb Lichtenwalter Blair King Jr Frazier Cady Rachel Farrell Sharon Smith Buzz Dietz Rick Subject Gulfstream Interconnects Meeting Tuesday at in EBC Please plan to attend a meeting on Tuesday at in C to initiate discussions on potential businesssystem implications associated with the new Gulfstream interconnects in Florida These will be new receipt points in the FL Market Area and will go inservice by MayJune
Phase VII Gulfstream Strategy Meeting Tuesday at in CA meeting is scheduled at on Tuesday in EBC to discuss Phase VII expansion and Gulfstream

FW Transportation Service ProposalFYI Original Message From Boatman Jack Sent Friday November AM To Hayes Robert Kilmer III Robert Lokey Teb McCoppin Dorothy Subject FW Transportation Service Proposal Importance High Sensitivity Confidential FYI Original Message From Boatman Jack Sent Friday November AM To Gonzales Eric Kaiser Jared Subject Transportation Service Proposal Importance High Sensitivity Confidential Attached is a draft service proposal to facilitate discussions regarding interruptible backhaul transportation service from the proposed Calypso Pipeline receipt point Please call if questions or you wish to discuss
